name: Legalising the Recreational Use of Marijuana Will Have a Beneficial Impact on a Country's Economy
summary: By the year 2022, the sale of marijuana had generated more than 3 billion dollars in annual tax revenue, making a substantial contribution to the economy of the United States of  America.

name: Article 2
summary: This article explores the benefits of regular exercise, including improved physical health, mental well-being, and increased productivity.

name: Article 3
summary: This article discusses the importance of time management, including strategies for prioritizing tasks, avoiding procrastination, and achieving a better work-life balance.

name: Article 4
summary: This article examines the role of technology in modern education, including the benefits and drawbacks of online learning, and the impact on student outcomes.
